rooms.description: A minimalist entry area with Vastu compliant orientation and a small storage space.
A combined open-plan living area with an integrated kitchen. Design incorporates minimalistic decor, ample natural light and Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
A flexible dining space adjacent to the living area, fostering communal interaction in a joint family setting.
A versatile room that can serve as a guest room or office space, respecting minimalist design and Vastu principles.
A well-lit bathroom with modern fixtures, designed in line with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
A compact storage area for joint family use, placed strategically in accordance with Vastu to maintain a harmonious layout.
A central open courtyard providing natural light, ventilation and communal space. Aligned with Vastu for positive energy circulation.

openings.description: Main entrance door with a Vastu-compliant placement ensuring auspicious entry, equipped with security features.
Multiple windows across living area and courtyard to maximize natural light while following Vastu guidelines for optimal positioning.
Secondary door facilitating service access, designed discreetly to maintain minimalistic aesthetic.
